short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A custom new tab page with a notepad and quicklinks in 80s DOS style

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your new tab into a sleek, DOS-styled interface. This extension provides a simple, retro-inspired design where you can store and quickly access your frequently used links and personal notes. All data is stored locally on your device, ensuring your information stays private. Perfect for users who appreciate minimalism and functionality in their browsing experience.
